channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Citrus-glazed pork chops with gingery bok choy
item.description:
Citrus-glazed pork chops with gingery bok choy



Rich pork makes a perfect companion to tart oranges in this tasty weeknight meal. The bold, bright, citrusy sauce demands a robust cut of meat, so pick well-marbled, thick-cut pork chops with a nice fat cap. A dry rub of brown sugar creates a caramelized layer that lends depth to the pan sauce, and the gingery bok choy adds a delightful bit of freshness..

item.title: Vegetarian minestrone
item.description:
Vegetarian minestrone



This hearty, vegetable-filled soup is warm and soothing, but light enough to not make you feel weighed down as youâ€™re out enjoying these beautiful days..

item.title: One-pot pasta with sausage and spinach
item.description:
One-pot pasta with sausage and spinach



This is the one-pot recipe to make when chopping an onion feels like too much work..

item.title: Teriyaki salmon with asian noodle salad
item.description:
Teriyaki salmon with asian noodle salad



Easy Teriyaki Salmon served on a bed of Asian Noodles made with brown rice noodles, fresh veggies and a homemade Asian Sesame Dressing! A light, simple refreshing recipe for the summer!.
